website_summaries.verdict: This PVC bed inflates within two minutes and fits most sedans, SUVs, and mini vans. It includes an inflatable pillow, but you will probably want to bring your own.
pros: Mattress and support must be inflated separately
Comfortable, although best for shorter people
Great for road trips or times when you need to make long drives as fast as possible
cons: Manufacturer states it is normal for bed to leak air after 10 hours and suggests re-inflating

customer_reviews.title: but it's a great addition to my travels
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for road trips/camping with my 2017 Jeep Wrangler (2-door)! It fits in my backseat and I have plenty of room for me and Dex (my 40 pound dog), whether I push the seats up for additional space or leave them as-is. Stick a sheet and comforter or sleeping bag on there and I'm all set! I'm only 5'1" which helps, but it's a great addition to my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! One of my better 'investments'. Spent 4 nights at the Pendleton Round Up in my Camry with this bed. It was heaven! Coming from a short girl with back problems... I was VERY comfortable. Easy to use, breakdown. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing for road trips and is surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toyota Corolla and this fits in the backseat perfectly. It is amazing for road trips and is surprisingly comfortable. The cord easily reaches my front console and this is incredibly easy to figure out how to set up. It's obvious how to blow it up and how do you use the pump. There really is nothing to it and it is a brilliant invention! If you nap in your car or you have a long road trip planned or even for short camping trips this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Polgara

customer_reviews.title: Much better. Add a sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping on the bare leather? Uncomfortable. Sleeping on this inflatable mattress? Much better. Add a sleeping bag? Asleep in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vesper Aeon

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were going on a camping trip, and weren't sure if there would be nights that we might sleep in the care. So glad we bought this for that option. We used it in a Chrysler 300. The air pump worked fast and the bed did not leak one bit. I slept on the floor side and was afraid of falling between the seats, but was able to sleep comfortably. Both of us are around 5'8" with small frames. We were able to sleep shoulder to shoulder with our knees bent up, or spoon each other with our legs stretched out toward the front seat. I was very surprised by the comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McWibbels

customer_reviews.title: Great for an overnight trip
customer_reviews.text: Blows up fairly easily and makes sleeping in the car a very comfortable experience. My boyfriend and I slept in it one night at the beach and other than it being a tad bit short it was still quite comfy. I would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Areived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Big tear in the bag to store the product and a tear on the product itself. No tear in the plastic bag it comes in or in the box it came in either!
customer_reviews.author: E. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I was driving 2000 miles with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was driving 2000 miles with 2 dogs. I thought sleeping in the back seat was easier than trying to find a hotel for me and my dogs. I found that when it was inflated, it worked well. Overall it served my needs. Pros The pump is powerful and inflates in minutes. The air mattress fit perfectly in my back seat. Cons The pump cord was a little short, so filling the mattress in the back seat from the front council was a challenge. You have to be quick or you loose significant air before you are able to plug the whole. I found this very frustrating. A leak guard would benefit this product greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 27-year-old son, who is a bit of a nomad and likes to travel on the cheap. He drives a 2009 Toyota Prius and says this inflatable car bed fits perfectly. He’s average height. With the seats folded back he can full stretch out and sleep very well, I’m told. I also got him the Koolatron LBS-01 Black 12 Volt Lunch Box Stove which allows him to cook foods with ease while on the road. This is a great solution for a person who likes to car camp!
customer_reviews.author: Reader99

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping in the car!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment! Comfortable and durable. I'm 5'6", 140 lbs, and no air was lost overnight. Nice that it includes an air pump too. I'd highly recommend this for some easy car camping.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: If it holds air it is GREAT but 50% chance it will leak right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of several we have bought over yhe last few years. It is hit or miss on whether or not they hold air right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Prather

customer_reviews.title: Car Bed
customer_reviews.text: Very good bed sleep comfortable in a tiny honda civic. And im not small or short so i had to put my legs over the driver seat my car is too small for me but it was really comfortable as i could get. I highly recommend for road trips or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Emily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a honda civic & I thought it would be too big since the back of my car is kind of small, but it actually fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Phan

customer_reviews.title: NO leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! easy to fill and holds air really well for our Yorkie!
customer_reviews.author: Whispers

customer_reviews.title: Defective. after two times use.
customer_reviews.text: Defective. after two times use. I am 150 lb only
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item and when it arrived I opened it and inspected it only to find that one of the seams leaks air so fast that it will not stay inflated for 30 minutes even. This is clearly a factory defect and a quality control issue. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I take naps in between classes for college ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I take naps in between classes for college and this is perfect! Fits well in my mid sized sedan and it is very durable! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Senzi

customer_reviews.title: It was an okay product for the first 3 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: It was an okay product for the first 3 weeks of use. But seem came apart and started leaking air became totally
customer_reviews.author: clayton.hn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t blow up
customer_reviews.text: I spent 15 minutes trying to blow up the mattress. It had barely even gotten any air in to it. I bought this specifically for a cross country trip I was going on, and didn’t get any use out of it. I didn’t get home in time to return, but I wish I could. Definitely not one of my favorite products I’ve ever bought. Great concept though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huber

customer_reviews.title: SO worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this air mattress for our cross country trips and it is amazing. It’s basically a twin bed in your bad seat. Air mattresses never really last long so after a few trips we’ll need to order another one but it’s 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last three months. This is the third one and all have failed. We finally bought a different style with a hard platform. It works great. Don't waste your money if you have a large dog.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: An ok product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea. It worked awesome the first few times. Still usable but part of the mattress blew up with air more than other parts so it became lob sided. Its still useful for camping etc.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Whitacre

customer_reviews.title: A Must Hsave for any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing I don't know how i did it before this came along. With my work I spend nights in my car way too often. This thing inflates in seconds, and fits like a glove. A dream. Love it. Folds up small, travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie612

customer_reviews.title: Good back support for an air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big blessing for a commuter with very long days and very early mornings. Good back support for an air mattress. Very comfortable. Fits great in the back of my nissan altima . I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M. Fleege

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable Car Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2010 Chevy Equinox. Fits pretty well. Air holds well. Mattress does get firm. Expect it will be comfortable to take a nap on at a rest stop while on a long trip. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This worked for one night only, leaked slowly the next night, and then didn't last 2 hours the next.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: During the summer time and late spring I take a little sleep on this thing when I do some traveling. Absolute awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros- looked good seem to work good Con- Only reason for bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros- looked good seem to work good Con- Only reason for bad review is ripped hole into first couple days
customer_reviews.author: Boyd jay Belgarde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this for our small dog to travel on and it works perfectly. It is a comfortable level surface for her to ride comfortably and takes down and puts back up in no time at all. We absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check for holes before return date.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in December, I think. I opened it and blew it up for the first time tonight. It deflated within a few minutes, so I aired it up again. I laid on it and it immediately deflated again and I heard a hissing noise. I can't find the hole, but it's obvious there is one. It would have been a good purchase had it not had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value ! Perfect for hunting or camping
customer_reviews.text: This is for the hunter or camper in your life. It is being used in a Toyota Tacoma. It fits perfectly and makes it easy for him to sleep in the back seat comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: CRP

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in my Avalanche!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in the backseat of my Chevy Avalanche! Be careful though when you are putting it in the backseat. I accidentally pulled the plug out and partially deflated it the first time we used it. Make sure that you push the air valves all the way in!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: This was very comfortable! Was a little slow getting to me but ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very comfortable! Was a little slow getting to me but it was in there basic time to deliver, just towards the end.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Carraway

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our road trip to South Dakota
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our road trip to South Dakota. Nights were cool and I was glad I was inside my vehicle and not laying on the ground in a tent. It fit well in my GMC double cab truck. The mattress isn't as wide as the seat so I just used a pillow to fill the void.The air held well and I was able to sleep good on it.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer “legs to reach floor. Had to prop ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs longer “legs to reach floor. Had to prop stuff under the legs as they were too short. Maybe for a smaller car
customer_reviews.author: DLopez

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for that
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make our captain seats a full seat To transport our daughter who was in a half spica cast for 6 weeks and could not set in a seat normally. It worked great for that. After the first couple of uses the seam leaked air. Husband was able to patch and it hold air now.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Flax

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It deflated the first night I used it. I’m returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pump Didn’t Work, very cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Received just before a trip and the 12VDC pump didn’t work. Will have to find another way to fill with air. After 2 uses would not hold air, very poor!
customer_reviews.author: David Kittel

customer_reviews.title: the material needs to be thicker and better
customer_reviews.text: would not hold air. the material needs to be thicker and better made
customer_reviews.author: Customer1979

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very comfortable, turned my car into a bedroom with this thing. That extra matress space in between the back seat and the front seats is what is convenient and helps you not to fall off
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fits all sedans and small suvs!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in a 2006 Camry, a 2012 ford fiesta, 2015 rav4 and a Mazda 3! Works awesome and is perfect to keep as a "just in case". It also comes with a blow up pillow but I recommend packing your own.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Wagner

customer_reviews.title: The air mattress has a leak that I can’t find ...
customer_reviews.text: The air mattress has a leak that I can’t find but in a hour it will be flat. And it’s short it doesn’t even touch the doors on both sides
customer_reviews.author: richard james

customer_reviews.title: takes a bit to get the right air pressure for ...
customer_reviews.text: takes a bit to get the right air pressure for my Lab. But she hasn't been able to poke a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for 3 month before the bed start to get hole.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not hold air for very long , had to re inflate everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Schlund

customer_reviews.title: Quality was ok, fitment was not
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase if you're looking to sleep in the back of a 2015 Silverado 1500 extended cab 4 door, it just doesn't fit right...had no issues with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy for a long road trip. Saved alot of money on hotels. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: carley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and now I can't get it to stay inflated. I only had it a couple months and now my return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept.. unfortunately my inflatable bed lasted one weekend before it started to leak between the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Ikaika pruett

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the two naps that it worked. When I inflated it the 3rd time, one of the seams split, making it unuseable
customer_reviews.author: Don Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and comfortable! But you have to inflate it a bit after 4-5 hours if you want the same comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Morteza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of sleeping during long days at work...now I love my 15 minute breaks at work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: customer service was great and the product worked and was perfect for traveling and breaks in between classes and such. the bed is comfy and the pillows work and are great. good buy
customer_reviews.author: Armando Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for camping. It also works whenever you need to rest in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Naps on naps on naps!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I work graveyard shifts so I love getting an extra snooze whenever possible! Light and compact so it fits in my trunk no problem. The inflation holes are a little difficult to use, but overall this item is great!
customer_reviews.author: holly nsullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly in my cobalt and it stayed inflated. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way more comfortable than sleeping on the bench
customer_reviews.text: Received in time for our 18 hour drive that turned into 24 , way more comfortable than sleeping on the bench. This was for a 2014 Nissan Rogue.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Works better than imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I travel a lot competing in Obstacle Course Races, and I like to camp in my car nearby. This mattress fills up the back seat perfectly, allowing me to stretch out more than just on the seat. AND, it doesn't deflate overnight! I'm 165lbs. Most home air mattresses seem to lose some air overnight. And yet, this one stayed inflated without my needing to refill it for a week straight!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sky

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine and was able to use it in poor weather when setting up a camp site would have been undesirable. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Grenik

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. The black material would be too hot to stay on during the summer though. I use it as a mini sofa in the living room as well and it stays inflated for a week before I deflated it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: It was great for a while
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a while, but it get a hole kind of quickly for me. They do give you a little patch to fix it though so that was very nice. Overall it was great
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Medina

customer_reviews.title: and I absolutely love it. It has come in so handy when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cross country road trip, and I absolutely love it. It has come in so handy when I need to stop and rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D

customer_reviews.title: Disabled traveler...
customer_reviews.text: With my disability I can't travel very often. This has allowed me to travel a bit and lay down when needed. Happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: kristen p.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my truck. I have a Sport Trac. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Burge

customer_reviews.title: Dog bed.
customer_reviews.text: Our middle row of seats in our 2015 Highlander Limited has two captains seats. We drive a long way every winter to a warm place. Our 55 pound dog can curl up on one seat but it's not comfortable for a long trip. This blow up mattress fits perfectly and we used the two blow up pillows to fill the middle between the seats. Our dog is very happy with his bed. So glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: diesel

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I’m short and small, this was honestly a great purchase, I’ve only used it once threw a little air in it two out of the four nights, I stayed warm in my car and slept well!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: shipping was fast and product is good as expected...would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dog, he loves ride in the car

customer_reviews.title: It really helped me, when ever i was sleeping ...
customer_reviews.text: It really helped me , when ever i was sleeping in my car i was thinking on my bed . Its a awesme product

customer_reviews.title: best back set bed for my honda civic
customer_reviews.text: recently travelled 15 hours on road with 12 years old.. normally i get asked question "are we there yet" with in few hours into journey.. this time this saved me from the question.. she told me that this is the best trip she ever had after 15 hours of day trip.. very comfort..
customer_reviews.author: Sundaram

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I would recommend this product. Note that the dimensions are to the top of the mattress are 17.5" ... not to the bottom of the mattress.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit 2012 Acura RL, center AC vent in the way

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really fit in my 2001 Prius. So decided to upgrade to a 2004 Prius for the hatchback.

customer_reviews.title: Havent got to road test it yet but so far I am pretty happy with the product and the pump that comes ...
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my 2014 Dodge Ram and while it doesn't make it all the way across it is close enough. Havent got to road test it yet but so far I am pretty happy with the product and the pump that comes with it works perfectly. It could use a bit longer cord for those that have only the dash plug in but if you have one in the center console or rear seat then your golden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT If you Travel alot NICE!! LOVE IT!!
